content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Create healthy partnerships with your stakeholders and build a win-win environment for your business. In this course, author and PMP Terri Wagner shows you how to manage stakeholders with savvy communication strategies that increase engagement in the final project. Learn how to analyze stakeholders, map power structures, keep open lines of communication, and use interpersonal skills to connect.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To-Do:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=c7a79468-9c0e-4ddd-ada8-7e852792f595\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managing Project Stakeholders \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"course as e-learner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read: How to improve communication with stakeholders – case studies –\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDMO/How+to+improve+communication+with+stakeholders+-+case+studies\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" DM Central (DMC) - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
